rules: path-prefix-nocase(/lucee/) or path-prefix-nocase(/tests/) -> ip-access-control[default-allow=false, acl={'127.0.0.* allow', '::1 allow'}, failure-status=404]

regex-nocase('.*(box\.json|Dockerfile|cfconfig\.json|server\.json)') or path-suffix-nocase(.env) or path-suffix-nocase(.md) or path-prefix-nocase(/includes/assets/) or path-suffix-nocase(.cfc) or path-prefix-nocase(/.well-known/) or path-prefix-nocase('/app') -> set-error(404)

set(attribute='%{o,Content-Security-Policy}', value="default-src 'none'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://static.cloudflareinsights.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com https://cdn.datatables.net https://www.google.com https://www.gstatic.com https://ga.jspm.io; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://cdn.datatables.net; img-src 'self' data: https://www.w3.org http://www.w3.org; form-action 'self'; base-uri 'self'; connect-src 'self' ws: wss: https://static.cloudflareinsights.com https://cloudflareinsights.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://www.google.com https://ga.jspm.io; font-src 'self' https://cdn.jsdelivr.net; frame-src 'self' https://www.google.com; object-src 'self'; media-src 'self'; child-src 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'")
